subject: Re: Crowthers Website Design
preview: Hi Heath,  Did you receive my email of corrections?

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Did you receive my email of corrections?
When can I expect these changes to be made? Considering they are not too big I am hoping to receive a link today.

Hi Heath, Thanks for that. There are some corrections that you previously fixed that have seemed to be reverted. Please change the following:
  • In the introduction text on the Group Page replace one word. In the sentence, "We have an impressive selection of single and multi-day packs to choose from that take you all around Australia." Please replace packs with tours.
  • Can delete this line of text "To see our selection of unforgettable day tours please click the link below."
  • At the bottom of the Group Tours page please include "More tours coming soon! Destinations include Tasmania, Queensland and New Zealand."

Hi Sabine, 

Confirming we have updated the 2 day tours now as well. 

Here is the link to review:
https://staging-crowtherscoaches.kinsta.cloud/group-tours/

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the call. This document is just to update the two day tours. thanks

Hi Heath,

Just checking you received my email from 4 days ago?
We have a meeting scheduled for Wednesday and it would be great to see some of these edits before then.
Thanks,
Sabine

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the recent update. Looks like some changes have been made which is great but not all that I included in the email.
For example:
- the Day 2 link isn't following through so I can't check if you have made the corrections to the Braidwood and Batemans Bay description or corrected the Hunter Valley and Port Stephens photo
- The Tulips photo has not been updated to the photo I included in the previous email
- We would like to see a version where the tours are grouped differently. Please see previous emails for correction. See Single Day Tours, 2-6 Day Tours, 7-14 Day Tours. This is an important correction to make. Thank you.
- I can't see if you have changed the West Coast wildflowers to 10 days
- I would like to see the new design with the 7-14 Day Tours with the length included in the title (please see previous email for clarification)

I think these are the main points that were missed. Everything else is looking good.

Thanks,
Sabine

Hi Sabine, 

We have now made the most recent round of updates, here is a link for you to review:
https://staging-crowtherscoaches.kinsta.cloud/charters-tours/group-tours/

@heath we need help with these remaining tasks:
  • We would like to change the grouping of the Tours. On the Group Tours page where all the Tours are separated we would like to Group the Tours into Single Day Tours, 2-6 Day Tours, 7-14 Day Tours.
  • The link will take you to a page with 2-6 Day Tours. To make a clear separation between the length of tours, have the tours separated by a blue bar with text that defines what this new section of tours will be.
  • For the 7-14 Day Tours link no need to have the blue bar, instead include the length of days in the title. Titles will read:
- 7 Days Lighting Ridge and NSW Outback - 10 Days West Coast Wildflowers - 13 Days Coral Coast Treasures in Western Australia - 13 Days Northwest Spectacular Lastly, this is related to the home page. Paul feels that the slide photos are still taking too long to load.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
@rica Please check sa mga hindi pa natapus na instructions need ko lang nag clarifications attached the comments with the finish task.

Thanks

Hi Rica, I have had a phone call with Paul and there are some changes we would like to make for the website. These changes are related to the most recent version you have sent https://staging-crowtherscoaches.kinsta.cloud/charters-tours/group-tours/
  • There are some spelling issues on the tiles, they should read "2 Day Tours" not "2 Days Tours". Please make this correction for all of the tours.
  • There is a double up of tours on Day 1. Please get rid of the "Southern Highlands- Retford Park and Berrima Dolans Bay" Tour.
  • Please replace the photo on the tour titled "Southern Highlands and Retford Park". Instead of the wine photo please replace it with the photo used in the tour for "Southern Highlands- Retford Park and Berrima Dolans Bay" that was deleted.
  • On the 2 Day Tours page, we would like to edit the text on the "Braidwood and Batemans Bay" tile. Please correct the first sentence to "Enjoy a local guided tour of beautiful Braidwood on your way to Batemans Bay." The rest is correct and can be left as is. This is to replace the first sentence.
  • West Coast wildflowers is a ten day tour not a seven day tour.
  • For the hunter Valley and Port Stephens Day Tour Tour please replace the photo of the wine with:
  • On the Three Day Tours link please replace the photo of the tulips with:
Some website design requests:
  • We have noticed that the text moves if one expands the page or views it on their phone. Sometimes the white text will be placed over the photo and make it hard to read. We would like the text to remain below the photo at all times.
  • We would like the tiles to be smaller so we can fit three across. There doesn't need to be lots of space around the photo and text.
  • A green button inserted on each tour page that allows the client to be taken back to the original Group Tours page. Title it "Back to tours"
  • At the bottom of every tile have a green button titled "Contact Us" with a symbol of a phone and email link. E.g. symbols and . these symbols will direct to either an email page or call the company. This will replace the blue bar with the text "These are just a few to tempt you, call us for an appointment to discuss tours that would appeal to your group - 02 9540 0900" at the bottom of the tour pages.
  • Please remove the introduction text that is repeated on each tour page. Only have that on the original Group Tour page.
  • In the introduction text on the Group Page replace one word. In the sentence, "We have an impressive selection of single and multi-day packs to choose from that take you all around Australia." Please replace packs with tours.
  • Can delete this line of text "To see our selection of unforgettable day tours please click the link below."
  • At the bottom of the Group Tours page please include "More tours coming soon! Destinations include Tasmania, Queensland and New Zealand."
  • We would like to change the grouping of the Tours. On the Group Tours page where all the Tours are separated we would like to Group the Tours into Single Day Tours, 2-6 Day Tours, 7-14 Day Tours.
  • The link will take you to a page with 2-6 Day Tours. To make a clear separation between the length of tours, have the tours separated by a blue bar with text that defines what this new section of tours will be.
  • For the 7-14 Day Tours link no need to have the blue bar, instead include the length of days in the title. Titles will read:
- 7 Days Lighting Ridge and NSW Outback - 10 Days West Coast Wildflowers - 13 Days Coral Coast Treasures in Western Australia - 13 Days Northwest Spectacular Lastly, this is related to the home page. Paul feels that the slide photos are still taking too long to load. Thanks a lot for all your help :) Also, as I haven't heard from you in 5 days please let me know if you have received this email. Sabine Pyne

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body: @heath we need your help with this.

Sabine
Attached are notes I made in preparation for our call, can you review beforehand.
Can we talk earlier than 2:45pm?

Paul

Get Outlook for Android

Hi Rica,

Could I please request 2 new versions. One that has Single Day Tours on a separate page (accessible via link or clicking on tile photo) and the rest on the tours on the original Group Tours page accessible via Green Toggle buttons.
And then on the second versions may I please request the latest version you have sent however with these additional changes:

1. The title slide on the first page needs to have a green button that says "Learn More" which takes the person to the Group tours page.
2. When you click on Day 1, Day 2, Day 3 etc tours, the new page begins with the same introduction. I feel like this is unnecessary and it should go straight into tour.
3. I think every photo/tile/tour should have a clickable "Contact Us" button attached that takes the person to an email page or a phone number. This is the shortest route for the client. Alternatively, there can just be the contact us button at the bottom of the page.

Thank You so much for your time and assistance,

If you have any questions please feel free to email me.

Thanks in advance,
Sabine Pyne

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hello,

Thanks a lot this is starting to look good. Could I please have a version whereby the single and multi day tours are more clearly separated. To be clear, the single day tours are a toggle and photo that take the viewer to a completely separate page that lists all of the single day tours. On the Group Tours page there is the multi-day packages. Does that make sense?

Hi Sabine,

We have made the changes as you requested and ready for you to review it.

Here's the link:
https://staging-crowtherscoaches.kinsta.cloud/charters-tours/group-tours/

Let us know if you would like further changes.

@rica Please check it now again. https://staging-crowtherscoaches.kinsta.cloud/charters-tours/group-tours/

Logged update time 1hr.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
@rica Please check it now.

https://staging-crowtherscoaches.kinsta.cloud/charters-tours/group-tours/

Logged time 1.5hrs

Thanks
